A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's as if the people who wrote and directed this movie never saw a Star Wars movie\, including the Force Awakens.  Just a truly awful movie.  Pretty much kills the franchise - in the future I'm pretty sure people will consider the 'Star Wars' movies to just be the first six (the prequels might have been 'meh' - but this was awful and ignores things like continuity\, plot\, logic\, and tone.  I'd give it zero stars if that were possible. Half a star is because the music was Star Wars-esque.
